Html:
Hello,

I draw markers using a copy of GmapMarkerGoogleGreen.

If I use png images, it centers the image incorrectly int the coordinates, the offset dosn't work well, I think. However, if I use a gif with the same size it works well.

I was getting crazy looking for the problem.

 

Thanks.
hm, can you share some demo project?

To test it, you cane use the GMapMarkerGoogleGreen.cs from gmap.net.windowsforms->markers. There you exchange the resource bigmarkergreen.gif to an png.

Then if you execute the demo.windowsforms you should see the image misplaced.

 

Well, it might be a problem  in my windows. I don't know.

 

Thank you.
